sourcesContent:
import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import {Link, useSearchParams, useNavigate, useLocation, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import {Form, Button, Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Card} from 'react-bootstrap' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import Message from '../components/Message' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import {getOrderDetail} from '../actions/orderAction' import * as cons from '../constants/orderContants' export default function OrderScreen() { const {orderId} = useParams() const dispatch = useDispatch() const navigate = useNavigate() const orderDetail = useSelector(state => state.orderDetail) const {order, error, loading} = orderDetail if (!loading && !error){ order.itemsPrice = order.orderItems.reduce((acc,item) => acc + item.price * item.qty, 0).toFixed(2) } useEffect(() => { if(!order || order._id !== Number(orderId)){ dispatch(getOrderDetail(orderId)) } },[order, orderId]) return loading? ( ): error ? ( (error) ) : (

ORDER: {orderId}

Shipping

Name: {order.user.name}

E-mail: {order.user.email}

Shipping: {order.shippingAddress.address}, {order.shippingAddress.city} {' '}, {order.shippingAddress.postalCode} {' '}, {order.shippingAddress.country}

{order.isDelivered ? ( Delivered on {order.deliveredAt} ): ( Not delivered ) }

Payment Method

Method: {order.paymentMethod}

{order.isPaid ? ( Paid on {order.paidAt} ): ( Not paid ) }

Order Items

{order.orderItems.length === 0 ? Order is empty. : ( {order.orderItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} X ${item.price} = ${(item.qty * item.price).toFixed(2)} ))} )}

Order Summary

Item: ${order.itemsPrice} Shipping: ${order.shippingPrice} Tax: ${order.taxPrice} Total: ${order.totalPrice}
) }
